TITLE: Episode 61 - Killectivism
DESCRIPTION: Your two favorite individualist Vixens, Jessie and Maddie, take a step back from the distracting chaos to remind you to focus on the theme that causes problems, not the countless little problems themselves: collectivism. Lumping us all together, erasing our individual identities, responsibilities, and liberties is not only harmful to each of us right now in the short term, but the Covid Collectivism is going to have untold ramifications for years to come.
